Name: okteto

Arguments.Name: build
Arguments.Description: Build (and optionally push) a Docker image

Arguments.Name: --loglevel
Arguments.Description: Amount of information outputted (debug, info, warn, error)

Arguments.Name: --namespace
Arguments.Description: Namespace against which the image will be consumed. Default is the one defined at okteto context or okteto manifest

Arguments.Name: --no-cache
Arguments.Description: Do not use cache when building the image

Arguments.Name: --secret
Arguments.Description: Secret files exposed to the build. Format: id=mysecret,src=/local/secret

Arguments.Name: --tag
Arguments.Description: Name and optionally a tag in the 'name:tag' format (it is automatically pushed)

Arguments.Name: --target
Arguments.Description: Set the target build stage to build

Arguments.Name: --branch
Arguments.Description: The branch to deploy (defaults to the current branch)

Arguments.Name: --file
Arguments.Description: Relative path within the repository to the manifest file (default to okteto-pipeline.yaml or .okteto/okteto-pipeline.yaml)

Arguments.Name: --filename
Arguments.Description: Relative path within the repository to the manifest file (default to okteto-pipeline.yaml or .okteto/okteto-pipeline.yaml)

Arguments.Name: --name
Arguments.Description: Name of the pipeline (defaults to the git config name)

Arguments.Name: --namespace
Arguments.Description: Namespace where the up command is executed (defaults to the current namespace)

Arguments.Name: --repository
Arguments.Description: The repository to deploy (defaults to the current repository)

Arguments.Name: --skip-if-exists
Arguments.Description: Skip the pipeline deployment if the pipeline already exists in the namespace (defaults to false)

Arguments.Name: --timeout
Arguments.Description: The length of time to wait for completion, zero means never. Any other values should contain a corresponding time unit e.g. 1s, 2m, 3h

Arguments.Name: --var
Arguments.Description: Set a pipeline variable (can be set more than once)

Arguments.Name: --wait
Arguments.Description: Wait until the pipeline finishes (defaults to false)
